settings.label: Message

settings.content: ðŸ’¡ Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

ðŸ’¡ For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/help-script-find-money-formats).
ðŸ’¡ Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: USD.

settings.info: [See the full list of currency codes](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php)
